description: This file defines a template class `BaseEventDelegate` within the `WPEFramework::AppGateway` namespace, serving as a simple event delegate helper for the gateway codebase. It declares a pure virtual method `Event` which accepts a variadic template parameter list, intended to be overridden by derived classes to handle events with varying argument types.

classes.name: BaseEventDelegate
classes.description: A template class serving as an event delegate helper, providing a pure virtual method `Event` with variadic arguments for subclasses to implement specific event handling logic.

methods.name: Event
methods.description: A pure virtual method meant to be overridden, accepting variadic arguments for event handling.
